data.comment: The match is underway at Red Bull Arena.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 3, Free kick in a good position for Leipzig!
Leipzig are pushing forward but Ibrahima Konate's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leipzig.
In the minute 4, Felix Zwayer signals a Freiburg throw-in in Leipzig's half.
In Leipzig a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Leipzig in their own half.
In the minute 7, Leipzig's Yussuf Poulsen breaks free at Red Bull Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
Throw-in for Leipzig at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 8, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Lucas Holer for Freiburg who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In Leipzig, Marcel Sabitzer of Leipzig is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Throw-in Freiburg.
In the minute 11, Free kick Freiburg.
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
Freiburg are whistled for offside.
In the minute 15, Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
Freiburg push upfield but Felix Zwayer quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 18, Leipzig's Emil Forsberg fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Freiburg needs to be cautious. Leipzig have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Freiburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Leipzig.
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
Freiburg's Lucas Holer gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 21, Felix Zwayer awards Leipzig a goal kick.
Free kick for Leipzig in the half of Freiburg.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
In the minute 23, Ball safe as Leipzig is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Leipzig.
Can Leipzig capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 25, Philipp Lienhart (Freiburg) has received a yellow card from Felix Zwayer.
Lucas Holer has recovered and rejoins the match in Leipzig.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead through Ibrahima Konate.
In the minute 26, That's a fine assist from Nordi Mukiele.
Leipzig will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Freiburg.
Leipzig's Willi Orban has been booked in Leipzig.
In the minute 29, Can Freiburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
Felix Zwayer awards the away team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, Leipzig's Nordi Mukiele goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Leipzig are coming forward and Emil Forsberg gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Corner awarded to Leipzig.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Freiburg at Red Bull Arena.
Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Freiburg to take a throw-in in Leipzig territory.
In the minute 37, Throw-in Freiburg.
Throw-in for Freiburg in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 39, Freiburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Leipzig at Red Bull Arena.
In Leipzig Leipzig attack through Kevin Kampl. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 43, Freiburg have a goal kick.
Felix Zwayer awards Leipzig a goal kick.
In Leipzig a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 44, Manuel Gulde (Freiburg) has received a first yellow card.
Leipzig awarded a throw-in in their own half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Felix Zwayer blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Felix Zwayer awards the away team a throw-in.
The home team replace Nordi Mukiele with Benjamin Henrichs.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Free kick for Leipzig in their own half.
In the minute 49, Can Freiburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leipzig's half?
Leipzig awarded a free kick in their own half.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
In the minute 52, Leipzig have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Felix Zwayer signals a Freiburg throw-in in Leipzig's half.
Ball safe as Leipzig is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Felix Zwayer awards the home team a throw-in.
Freiburg to take a throw-in in Leipzig territory.
Felix Zwayer signals a throw-in for Freiburg, close to Leipzig's area.
In the minute 56, Corner awarded to Freiburg.
Corner awarded to Freiburg.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leipzig.
In the minute 59, Freiburg push forward at Red Bull Arena and Lukas Kubler gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Leipzig defence.
Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Leipzig.
Freiburg to take a throw-in in Leipzig territory.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Leipzig at Red Bull Arena.
Throw-in high up the field for Freiburg in Leipzig.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Freiburg just outside Leipzig's area.
In the minute 62, Benjamin Henrichs for Leipzig has been booked by Felix Zwayer and receives a first yellow card.
Julian Nagelsmann is making the team's second substitution at Red Bull Arena with Alexander Sorloth replacing Emil Forsberg.
Leipzig make their third substitution with Dani Olmo replacing Amadou Haidara.
Freiburg's Christian Gunter misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 64, Leipzig have a goal kick.
In the minute 64, Jonathan Schmid is replacing Lukas Kubler for the away team.
Christian Streich (Freiburg) is making a second substitution, with Vincenzo Grifo replacing Baptiste Santamaria.
Ball safe as Freiburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Leipzig in their own half.
In the minute 66, Can Freiburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Leipzig's half?
An attacking Leipzig player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Marcel Sabitzer gives Leipzig a 2-0 lead from the penalty spot.
In the minute 71, Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Leipzig in their own half.
At Red Bull Arena, Leipzig are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 74, Throw-in high up the field for Freiburg in Leipzig.
Freiburg have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Freiburg pushes forward through Nicolas Hofler, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Freiburg.
In the minute 75, Freiburg drives forward and Nils Petersen gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 75, Woo-yeong Jeong is on a sub for Nicolas Hofler for Freiburg.
Freiburg make their fourth substitution with Nils Petersen replacing Roland Sallai.
Leipzig's Alexander Sorloth is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in Freiburg.
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Freiburg drive upfield and Woo-yeong Jeong gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leipzig defender.
Felix Zwayer signals a Freiburg throw-in in Leipzig's half.
In the minute 79, Christopher Nkunku gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leipzig.
Free kick for Freiburg in their own half.
Yussuf Poulsen (Leipzig) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 81, Can Leipzig get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Freiburg's half?
Throw-in for Freiburg at Red Bull Arena.
Throw-in for Freiburg in the half of Leipzig.
In the minute 82, The home team replace Kevin Kampl with Tyler Adams.
Freiburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Manuel Gulde is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 84, The away team have replaced Manuel Gulde with Chang-Hoon Kwon. This is the fifth substitution made today by Christian Streich.
Throw-in for Leipzig in the half of Freiburg.
Dani Olmo for Leipzig gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a Freiburg goal kick.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
Felix Zwayer signals a Leipzig throw-in in Freiburg's half.
In the minute 87, Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hee-chan Hwang is on a sub for Christopher Nkunku for Leipzig.
Free kick for Leipzig in the half of Freiburg.
In the minute 89, Goal! Angelino extends Leipzig's lead to 3-0.
Nils Petersen (Freiburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Leipzig in their own half.
Leipzig have a goal kick.
Freiburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Freiburg in their own half.
Felix Zwayer blows to end the match. The final score is 3-0.
Lino Tempelmann (Freiburg) gets a yellow card.
